topic: How to deploy REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying REST APIs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive walkthrough on how to create and deploy REST APIs using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Defining API routes, endpoints, and handling HTTP methods
Implementing data models, validators, and middleware
Testing the API locally using tools like Uvicorn or Hypercorn
Deploying the FastAPI application to production (options for Heroku, AWS, Google Cloud, etc.)
version_notes: FastAPI version: Latest stable release (v0.73.0 as of writing)
caveats: Ensure Python 3.12 and FastAPI are installed
Adjust the code examples for your specific deployment environment
Follow best practices for API design, security, and performance optimizations
